liver.description: hypodense lesion at the liver dome, slightly increased compared to prior study, likely represents a cyst

findings.heart: The visualized portions of the heart and pericardium are unremarkable.
findings.pancreas: No focal lesions or peripancreatic stranding or fluid collection.
findings.kidneys: Normal in size and shape. No pelvicaliceal dilatation or perinephric abnormalities.

appendix.description: dilated with surrounding fat stranding consistent with appendicitis

findings.aorta: Normal in caliber without aneurysmal dilatation.
findings.pelvis: Unremarkable urinary bladder and distal ureters, no free fluid.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Slight increase in size of the liver lesion compared to prior study.
